sentences.english: At this period, Ying white of the light pillar damage to cost a lumber moncler jackets rush by horizon.
sentences.chinese: 就在这时，莹白的光柱突破花林，冲向天际。

sentences.english: Travelling through air and turbulence can disperse the energy of the beam.
sentences.chinese: 穿过空气和乱流时会分散光柱的能量。

sentences.english: Some said the light wasn't moving, just hovering.
sentences.chinese: 还有人说光柱没有移动，只是在空中回旋。

sentences.english: Light pillars can be observed in cities with many different colorful light sources.
sentences.chinese: 城市中五颜六色的光源形成了颜色各异的光柱。

sentences.english: Some cars passed and the beams of their headlights carved the space in two.
sentences.chinese: 一些汽车驶过，车灯的光柱将漆黑的太空切为两半。

sentences.english: At this time, Ying white of the light pillar break to spend a wood and rush at horizon.
sentences.chinese: 就在这时，莹白的光柱突破花林，冲向天际。

sentences.english: Two beams of light continue to shine up from New York City until dawn this morning.
sentences.chinese: 两束光柱从纽约城持续闪耀直致今日黎明前。

sentences.english: Peak hold feature on LCD bar-graph for sound comparison.
sentences.chinese: 峰值保留功能的LCD光柱，为良好的比较。

sentences.english: The beams from the lighthouse are here.
The moon rains out her beams, and heaven is overflowed.
sentences.chinese: 射出烟雨般的光柱，天际满盈。

sentences.english: Pillars are caused by ice crystals floating in high clouds.
sentences.chinese: 光柱的形成是由于漂浮在高云的冰晶。

sentences.english: He lifted his head into the light, at a moment of extreme ecstasy.
sentences.chinese: 在光柱中他抬起了头，处于极度的迷醉中。

definition: silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
stream of water (as from a fountain or a faucet)/jet of water
multicolored sunlight of sunrise or sunset
